name: .LOC File Extension
summary: Learn about .LOC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Standard GPS location format that includes waypoints and related data; may be used to store saved locations and places of interests (POIs); supported by DeLorme Topo and other GPS/mapping programs.

content: LOC files are similar to .GPX files, but are saved in a different format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
